dimension: overall (Machine overcast top & bottom.): 26 x 55 in. (66.04 x 139.7 cm)
title: Airline Samples
description: Unidentified but possibly PanAm fabric in various weaves, blue & brown. Nos. 6 - 13 are more boldly woven patterns in plain & plaid. Double weave. Variations of two colors (blue & brown) woven together, each 27.5\" wide. One inch plaid vert. stripes between 2\" plain vert. stripes. (Bright blue - stripe)
